title: CAR MODEL detail page Â» Successor
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to see the successor of a CAR MODEL (if existent)\
So I can find out more about the family tree
description:
* The CAR MODEL detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected SUCCESSOR.
* The SUCCESSOR is presented with its name and primary information.
* The SUCCESSOR contains a link to its detail page.
* The SUCCESSOR has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no SUCCESSOR connected to the CAR MODEL then the section is not displayed at all.
